ygData.subject: RE: Neriak faction
ygData.msgSnippet: I was at the web site for the Keepers of the Darkness.  Clicked on their links button and went to Allakazamms site (I think it was that one).  One of the
ygData.messageBody:
I was at the web site for the Keepers of the Darkness. Clicked on their
links button and went to Allakazamms site (I think it was that one). One of
the sections on his page is factions, which lists nearly all the factions
and what you have to do to raise or lower them. Pretty cool site, don't
remember the url but you can get to it from the keepers page:
www.keepersofthedarkness.com

Lykos


> Keep in mind that raising faction with Indigo Brotherhood does NOT raise
> faction with the merchants and other groups in Neriak. I have found no way
> to do so and believe me I have looked...
